title: Health expert warns of dangers posed by Omicron variant
content: Sri Lankan health experts warn that patients with chronic diseases and other complications should be concerned about the Omicron variant of the Covid-19 virus. The Head of the Health Ministryâ€™s integrated home-based care programme, Consultant Family Physician Dr. Malkanthi Galhena stated that presently most families have more than one person infected with the Omicron variant.
